Article.ArticleTitle: Comment on Fust et al. The Potential Economic Impact of the Updated COVID-19 mRNA Fall 2023 Vaccines in Japan. Vaccines 2024, 12, 434.

Abstract.AbstractText: We noted three key inconsistencies in the Moderna-funded cost-effectiveness analysis by Fust et al [...].

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Hannah R. Volkman, Jennifer L. Nguyen, Mustapha M. Mustapha, Luis Jodar, and John M. McLaughlin declare employment and/or holding stocks and/or options at Pfizer Inc. during the conduct of the study. The authors declare no non-financial competing interests.
